entities.description: Frequency and nature of tobacco, alcohol, and drug use by individuals.
Indicators and statistics related to mental health conditions among individuals.
Details on whether individuals have received treatment for substance use or mental health issues.
Demographic information including age, gender, and location of respondents.
Classification of areas as rural for analysis of resilience in such regions.
Economic conditions or status of the individuals surveyed.
Educational attainment levels of the respondents.
Any legal incidents or consequences related to substance use.
Overall health indicators of respondents, including any chronic conditions.
Support systems including family and social support available to the respondents.

relationships.description: Links the survey to data on substance use.
Links the survey to data on mental health conditions.
Indicates whether the respondent has received any treatment for substance use or mental health.
Includes demographic information of respondents in the survey.
Links respondents to their economic status.
Links respondents to their level of educational attainment.
Links substance use to any legal consequences that may have occurred.
Links respondents to their overall health status.
Indicates the level of family support available to the respondents.
